LanguageData.RE_SpectreJoins.label: spectre joins
LanguageData.RE_SpectreJoins.letterText: Sensing trouble, a mysterious spectre has arrived.\n\nSpectres are agents entrusted with extraordinary authority by the Citadel Council, including the power of life and death over the inhabitants of the galaxy. Will [PAWN_pronoun] be able to set things right in these parts before moving on to continue their mission?
LanguageData.RE_PyjaksJoins.label: pyjaks joins
LanguageData.RE_LocalBattlefield.label: local battlefield
